Package com.g1.mychess.admin.service

Interface AdminService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminServiceImpl
public interface AdminService
Service interface for administrative actions in the system. It includes functionalities for managing players' blacklist and whitelist statuses, as well as automatic whitelisting of expired bans.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    autoWhitelistExpiredBans()
    Automatically whitelists players whose bans have expired.

    Blacklists a player based on the provided blacklist data.

    findAdminByUsername(String username)
    Retrieves the admin details by their username.

    whitelistPlayer(WhitelistDTO whitelistDTO, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

  • Method Details

    • findAdminByUsername

      UserDTO findAdminByUsername(String username)
      Retrieves the admin details by their username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the admin to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A UserDTO object containing the admin's details.
      Throws:
      AdminNotFoundException - If no admin is found with the given username.

    • blacklistPlayer

      void blacklistPlayer(BlacklistDTO blacklistDTO, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Blacklists a player based on the provided blacklist data. The player is marked as blacklisted and the blacklist record is saved.
      Parameters:
      blacklistDTO - The data transfer object containing the player ID, reason for blacklisting, and the ban duration.
      request - The HTTP request to get the admin's details who is performing the action.
      Throws:
      InvalidBlacklistOperationException - If the player is already blacklisted or the blacklist operation is invalid.

    • whitelistPlayer

      void whitelistPlayer(WhitelistDTO whitelistDTO, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Whitelists a player by removing them from the blacklist. The player's record is updated, and the whitelist status is saved.
      Parameters:
      whitelistDTO - The data transfer object containing the player ID, reason for whitelisting.
      request - The HTTP request to get the admin's details who is performing the action.
      Throws:
      InvalidBlacklistOperationException - If the player is not blacklisted and cannot be whitelisted.

    • autoWhitelistExpiredBans

      @Scheduled(fixedRate=3600000L) void autoWhitelistExpiredBans()
      Automatically whitelists players whose bans have expired. This method runs every hour (as configured by the @Scheduled annotation). It checks all active blacklist records and whitelists the players whose ban duration has expired.
